title: Finding GCF
text: The first step is to find the greatest common factor of both terms.

title: Rewriting each term
text: The next step is to rewrite each term as a product of the GCF and another term.

title: Using the distributive property
text: The final step is to use the reverse distributive property to take the GCF out of the equation. This results in the equation $$5x^{2\left(x-5\right)}$$
